(e) Assume loans in Egania were made taking into account an expected inflation rate of <math alttext="30%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. Will borrowers in Egania be better off, worse off, or not affected after they realize the actual inflation rate calculated in part (c)(i) ? Explain.
